com.ooyala.android.ads.vast

Class VASTAdSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.item.AdSpot
      • com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        • com.ooyala.android.ads.vast.VASTAdSpot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AdSpot>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VMAPAdSpot

    public class VASTAdSpot
extends OoyalaManagedAdSpot
    A model of an VAST Ad spot, which can be played during video playback

    • Constructor Detail

      • VASTAdSpot

        public VASTAdSpot(int timeOffset,
                  int duration,
                  java.net.URL clickURL,
                  java.util.List<java.net.URL> trackingURLs,
                  java.net.URL vastURL)
        Initialize a VASTAdSpot using the specified data
        Parameters:
        timeOffset - the time offset at which the VASTAdSpot should play
        clickURL - the clickthrough URL
        trackingURLs - the tracking URLs that should be pinged when this ad plays
        vastURL - the VAST URL containing the VAST compliant XML for this ad spot

      • VASTAdSpot

        public VASTAdSpot(org.json.JSONObject data)
        Initialize a VASTAdSpot using the specified data (subclasses should override this)
        Parameters:
        data - the NSDictionary containing the data to use to initialize this VASTAdSpot

      • VASTAdSpot

        public VASTAdSpot(int timeOffset,
                  int duration,
                  org.w3c.dom.Element e)
        initialize a VASTAdSpot via XML document
        Parameters:
        timeOffset - the time offset of the ad spot
        duration - the content duration
        e - the VAST document element

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public com.ooyala.android.item.JSONUpdatableItem.ReturnState update(org.json.JSONObject data)
        Update the VASTAdSpot using the specified data (subclasses should override and call this)
        Parameters:
        data - the NSDictionary containing the data to use to update this VASTAdSpot
        Returns:
        ReturnState.STATE_FAIL if the parsing failed, ReturnState.STATE_MATCHED if it was successful

      • fetchPlaybackInfo

        public boolean fetchPlaybackInfo(OoyalaAPIClient api,
                                 PlayerInfo info)
        Fetch the additional required info for the ad NOTE: As of right now, we only support VAST 2.0 Linear Ads. Information about Non-Linear and Companion Ads are stored in the dictionaries nonLinear and companion respectively.
        Specified by:
        fetchPlaybackInfo in class OoyalaManagedAdSpot
        Returns:
        false if errors occurred, true if successful

      • needsPauseContent

        public boolean needsPauseContent()
        Overrides:
        needsPauseContent in class AdSpot
        Returns:
        if the ad spot needs to pause content and play an ad stream return true if content needs to be paused, e.g. VAST Linear ads false if content does not need to be paused, e.g. VAST Nonlinear ads
